channel.title: Transporation on Mountain Doodles

item.title: TOD Mode Share
item.description: Just saw a comment on the Pricetags blog pointing to a nice master’s thesis investigating various TOD metrics around skytrain stations. I got curious how the 2011 transit mode share compares to the earlier census years listed in the thesis. And how the mode share varies spatially. With CensusMapper at my finger tips and building on the visuals from the previous post this is an easy exercise. We again simply map our concentric circles around the stations, but this time we turn them into pie charts to show the commute to work mode share.
